Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text on recto (16 ll.), list of 3 witnesses on verso. This item and P BM EA 10502 are parts of the same document. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "marriage settlement between Petearsemtheus son of Panobchunis and Sensebek (Sensuchis) daughter of Thotsutm. Scribe Petearsemtheus son of Pa-Gebk. Date. year 20(?) Athyr 7 of Ptol. Alexander = BC. 95(?) Nov. 21". Concerning this group of texts, see entry for P BM EA 10491.
Curator's comments: Part of 1896,0731.12 Kaplony-Heckel, U., Das Getreide-Darlehn P. Haun. Inv. Demot. 2, in K. Ryhol (ed.), Acts of the seventh international conference of Demotic studies. Copenhagen, 2002, 246. Text 30 in Shore's Manuscript Catalogue of Demotic Gebelein Papyri in the British Museum. Publication in progress (C.J. Martin/S.E. Thomas). Cf. entry in www.trismegisots.org - DAHT.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (317) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/317)
